Website.theStoryText: In 2168, a discovery on the Moon triggers an interstellar war with unimaginable stakes. An extraterrestrial artifact, a distress signal… and an alien species ready to do anything to protect its territory. Welcome to Selenite: Lost Contact. Explore the Terran Alliance, the mysterious Horizon, and the desperate mission of pilot Alex Carter. Dive into the heart of the conflict, uncover the secrets of the aliens, and analyze their technologies. The exploration begins now. Will you be able to unravel all the mysteries?
Website.theHorizonText: No one knows where they come from or what their true intentions are. The Horizon leave nothing behind but ruins and silence. Their technology defies the known laws of physics, their intelligence surpasses human comprehension, and their collective consciousness makes them elusive. Are they conquerors, guardians, or something far more ancient? One thing is certain: they have answered a distress call, and humanity will pay the price.
Website.yourMissionText: A ruined station, an unknown enemy, an imminent threat. Alex Carter is sent on a reconnaissance mission to the Moon, but what he discovers surpasses anything humanity could have imagined. An alien cannon ready to annihilate Earth, an impenetrable shield, heavily armed enemy outposts… To stop the inevitable, he must infiltrate enemy lines, destroy extraterrestrial defenses, and strike at the heart of their arsenal. Alone against a superior civilization, every battle is a fight for survival. The mission is clear: strike fast, strike hard… and do not fail.

Footer.downloadDesc: Get the latest version of the game for your favorite platform
Footer.downloadButton: Get it through the dedicated website !
Footer.downloadGithub: Get it from the github repository !

Wiki.title: Welcome to the wiki !
Wiki.description: The wiki is only available in French for now

Communication.title: Communication
Communication.subtitle: A great idea is nothing without the right words. Every message we share builds a connection, every conversation shapes perception. Clarity inspires trust, consistency reinforces identity, and storytelling turns vision into movement.
Communication.description: This is how we communicate our brand—with purpose, precision, and impact.

Team.title: Team
Team.subtitle: Good teams create great work. Behind every idea, every design, every line of code, there's a collective effort—a balance of skill, passion, and vision. Strength comes from collaboration, innovation thrives on diversity, and success is built on trust.
Team.description: These are the people who shape our brand. Together, we turn ambition into reality.

Logo.title: Logo
Logo.subtitle: A symbol is more than just a shape-it carries meaning, history, and purpose. For Selenite, the lunar eclipse is more than a celestial event; it is a beacon of mystery and survival.
Logo.description: This is the emblem of Selenite. A mark of exploration, danger, and the fight for humanity's survival.

Colors.title: Colors
Colors.subtitle: A color defines a side. For humans, blue represents hope and resilience. For aliens, red embodies fear and danger. Each shade tells a story, each hue marks a territory. In a universe where colors signify allegiance, choose your side wisely.
Colors.description: Here are the colors that define our brand. Use them to create a consistent experience for our users.

Fonts.title: Fonts
Fonts.subtitle: Fonts shape the way we experience a brand. In a universe where typography speaks before words are read, let the right design carry your voice.
Fonts.description: These are the fonts that define our brand—use them to craft a seamless and compelling experience.

Assets.title: Illustrations
Assets.subtitle: A symbol is never just a shape. An element carries meaning, shaping perception before a single word is read. Every visual is a bridge between function and emotion, guiding users through a seamless experience.
Assets.description: These are the illustration and iconography principles that define our brand—use them to create a cohesive and memorable experience.
